name: Develop Vision and Strategy
description: Establishes the firm's strategic direction, business model, and market positioning.

name: Develop and Manage Corporate Governance
description: Defines board structure, committees, oversight mechanisms, and decision-making processes.

name: Develop and Manage Human Capital
description: Covers staffing structure, recruitment, training, remuneration, and key personnel.

name: Develop and Manage Products and Services
description: Defines products/services offered, design, development, approval processes, and regulated activities.

name: Market and Sell Products and Services
description: Covers client acquisition strategy, target markets, client types, and marketing approach.

name: Deliver Services
description: Defines how services will be delivered, including processes, platforms, and operational workflows.

name: Manage Customer Service
description: Defines ongoing client relationship management, complaints handling, and service standards.

name: Manage Enterprise Risk, Compliance, Remediation, and Resiliency
description: Outlines risk management framework, compliance systems, AML/CTF controls, and regulatory adherence.

name: Manage Financial Resources
description: Defines financial projections, capital adequacy, and resource management.

name: Manage Information Technology
description: Defines technology systems, platforms, and IT infrastructure.

name: Manage External Relationships
description: Defines outsourcing arrangements, partner relationships, and external service providers.

name: Develop and Manage Business Capabilities
description: Captures additional business capabilities beyond regulated activities, including unregulated activity coverage.

name: Acquire, Construct, and Manage Assets
description: Defines physical premises and infrastructure requirements.
